text:
Hesham Mohamed Kandil or Kandeel (also spelled: " Hisham Qandil or Qandeel ";  ) (born 17 September 1962) is an Egyptian engineer and civil servant. He was Prime Minister of Egypt from 2012 to 2013.
Qandil was appointed as Prime Minister by President Mohamed Morsi on 24 July 2012. Qandil was Minister of Water Resources and Irrigation from 2011 to 2012.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Water Resources and Irrigation
